Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Workout Tracker V2 PWA

Features:
- Multi-user authentication with Supabase
- Offline-first architecture with IndexedDB
- Auto-sync to Supabase when online
- Create and manage custom workouts
- Exercise library with 12+ exercises
- Log workout sessions with sets/reps/weight tracking
- Workout history and progress tracking
- Workout planning with calendar view
- Mobile-responsive PWA with offline support

Tech Stack:
- React 18 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Vite + Vite PWA Plugin
- Supabase (backend/auth/database)
- Dexie.js (IndexedDB)
